frontMatter.title: Contingency and Reliability Reviews
frontMatter.metaDescription: Plan and action business continuity strategy to minimize business risks. Consider technical, market, and environmental factors. Ensure the readiness with various drills.

checklist.question: Have you identified potential risks to your day to day operations?
checklist.expectation: All possible threats needs to be identified and the team should have an idea about possibility and the impact of those unfortunate situations.

checklist.question: Have you established a contingency plan?
checklist.expectation: A plan should be in place with alternatives for each of the above mentioned potential threats. The team should be aware of the plan.

checklist.question: Have you done a contingency drill?
checklist.expectation: It is vital that the team has done a test of the contingency plan. It is better to be prepared for all conditions.
